overview:
Ted Titmus, inventor and founder of LifeSaver, is a seasoned veteran in business development with experience in early-stage companies including high tech and consumer products.

As a winning driver /owner of Grand Prix Formula Race Car Teams for more than 25 years in the U.S., Europe, Canada and Mexico, Mr. Titmus was responsible for team sponsorships totaling millions of dollars with clients such as Budweiser, FedEx and Flying Tiger Airlines. He translates the preparation, attention to detail, and every aspect of team racing (multimillion-dollar budgets, manufacturing, staffing, sponsors and logistics) plus his management skills which translates into every aspect of his business career.
